relevant_findings.HEENT: Anicteric sclera, pink conjunctiva, mucous membranes moist, good dentition, posterior oropharynx erythematous.
relevant_findings.lung: Crackles at left base, clear to auscultation otherwise; distant breath sounds.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Nondistended, normal bowel sounds, nontender in all quadrants.
relevant_findings.GU: No ulcers or lesions on penis shaft or head; meatus clear; prostate examination refused.
relevant_findings.extremities: No cyanosis, clubbing or edema, moving all four extremities with purpose.
relevant_findings.musculoskeletal: No spinal tenderness, positive costovertebral angle tenderness left greater than right.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient was observed overnight for tachycardia; vital signs showed improvement post initial observation.
